oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Power law-based Automated Fitting and Energy Density Prediction for Ionic Liquid--Electrode Interfaces

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This project contains the complete dataset and all supporting scripts for the article, 'Ionic Liquidâ€“Electrode Interface: From One Law to Fit Them All to One Model to Predict Them All.' Included are the empirical data, scripts to reproduce all figures in the publication, and a toolkit for data analysis and energy density prediction in ionic liquid systems.
